alert.note: Alert for East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Hubbard; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 12:42PM CST until February 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Isolated higher amounts are possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph and could lead to significant blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northwest and west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...From midnight CST tonight through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Becker; East Otter Tail; Grant; Hubbard; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
